name: jewelry-store-monorepo
description: Complete jewelry e-commerce platform with admin and customer interfaces

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client-admin && npm install && cd ../client-customer && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:customer"
scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run build:customer
scripts.start: concurrently --names "SERVER,ADMIN,CUSTOMER" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:customer"
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:admin && npm run test:customer
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:admin && npm run lint:customer
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:builds
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Long
